seo: wordpress插件,User Meta,本地文件枚举漏洞,EXP
seo_en: wordpress plugin,User Meta,local file enumeration vulnerability,EXP
summary: 该插件用于检测wordpress的User Meta插件是否存在本地文件枚举漏洞，通过发送特定请求来判断目标文件是否存在。
summary_en: This plugin is used to detect whether the User Meta plugin of wordpress has local file enumeration vulnerability by sending specific requests to determine if the target file exists.
